Consumed in moderation, it offers health benefits by providing considerable amounts of several vitamins and minerals. Blood Health. The mineral iron, contained in Ovaltine, is critical for delivering oxygen throughout the body and for hemoglobin production. A person whose body is low in iron can develop iron-deficiency anemia, which can cause symptoms such as fatigue, rapid pulse and difficulty breathing.
